name: Convectioninator
tagline: Arduino and related files for the Convectionator project.
body:
### Hello Engineering Team Members!

In our first meeting someone mentioned setting up a github page for us to use for software collaboration. I've downloaded stuff from github before, but never set up a repository myself, so here we go...

Right now everything is open to the world, I don't see much reason to lock things down now. I've added the test sketch I used to get the Arduino talking to the LCDs. Also I started a README and figured we could list all of the Arduino libraries you need to have installed for our many components. Add as you see fit!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
